name: Shell Shock (itch) (SnailSoft)
description:
"Nut up or slug up.

Those slimy pests have slithered on our soil for the last time. On the battlefield, we're evenly matched, but you're going to change that.

You're going undercover. find the slugs' plans and switch them up to give us the edge.

Make us proud."

-Major Cornelius Ironshell

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A card game like you've never seen before!

In the midst of an age-old conflict between Snails and Slugs, go undercover and turn the tides to win the war!

Draw your hand, and switch out the enemies cards for your own, sabotaging them and leading to their demise. Don't get caught though, we wouldn't want that pretty shell of yours to get broken.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS -

As a snail undercover, your job is to make the slugs lose! Each turn you'll see the snails' intended plans. Then click and swap your cards with the slugs' cards to ruin their plans! Remember, you want those slugs to lose!

Once you've made your plans, click PLAY to watch the battle play out!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Definitely the best snail game I've seen all day. Maybe all week, even."

"Oh, I get it now. It's out of control cause you aren't picking your own cards, that's clever."

"I haven't slept in two days I'm just happy we're releasing."

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This Shell Shock prototype was made as part of the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2020. Every part of this game, including gameplay, programming, art, and music, were all created in less than 48 hours. 

If you like this idea and would like to see more, be sure to comment and let us know!
